mapper.select: SELECT c.operator, c.val, cr.unit_price FROM charge_rule cr LEFT JOIN parking_lot pl ON pl.charge_rule_id = cr.charge_rule_id LEFT JOIN conditions c ON c.condition_id = cr.condition_id WHERE pl.parking_lot_id = #{parkingLotId}
SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.score FROM parking_lot pl LEFT JOIN comment c ON c.parking_lot_id = pl.parking_lot_id WHERE pl.parking_lot_id = #{parkingLotId}

SELECT distinct pl.parking_lot_id, pl.longitude, pl.latitude, pl.description, pl.category, ifnull(subTable.num, 0) space_count FROM parking_lot pl LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.parking_lot_id, count(distinct s.space_id) num FROM space s LEFT JOIN orders o ON s.space_id = o.space_id WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.cancel_flag = 0 AND begin_time < #{endTime} AND end_time > #{beginTime} GROUP BY s.parking_lot_id ) subTable ON pl.parking_lot_id = subTable.parking_lot_id
